title: conferred on me by section 44G(1B) of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the National Oil Reserves Agency Act
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the National Oil Reserves Agency Act 
2007 (Additional Certificates for Renewable Transport Fuel) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2025.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited national oil reserve agency act 2007 (additional certificate renewable transport fuel) (amendment) regulation 2025

title: conferred on me by section 44G(1B) of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act
heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 1st day of July 2025.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 1st day of July 2025.
text_norm: 2 regulation shall come operation 1st day july 2025

title: conferred on me by section 44G(1B) of the National Oil Reserves Agency Act
heading: 3. The National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (Additional Certificates for
text_raw:
3. The National Oil Reserves Agency Act 2007 (Additional Certificates for 
Renewable Transport Fuel) Regulations 2023 (S.I. No. 143 of 2023) are 
amended - 

(a) 

in Regulation 3, by the substitution of “Subject to Regulation 3A, 
the following” for “the following”, and 

(b) by the insertion of the following Regulation after Regulation 3: 

“3A. Renewable transport fuels produced from palm oil mill 
effluents (POME) are excluded from the scope of paragraphs (a), 
(b), (d) and (e) of Regulation 3.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

10 June, 2025. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 
Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [247] 3
